application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (Submission of Details - a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors and architraves with details of mouldings in section (1:1) and a plan showing retained/historic doors and new doors. New doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted; b) Plan (1:10) and materials of new grille; c) Plan (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new rooflight; d) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new staircase with details of mouldings in section (1:1); e) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new staircase screen with details of mouldings in section (1:1); f) Plan and section (1:5 / 1:1) of new ceiling roses) of Listed Building consent LB/24/02612 (Internal alterations at all levels. Demolition and replacement of modern lower ground and ground floor rear infill extension. (In part regularisation and reinstatement works to address variations from the approved plans granted under planning and listed building consent references PP/12/00511 and LB/12/00519.))
